title: Hour 1 : Kyrie's Last Game in NY?
description:
Stephen A Smith and Kendrick Perkins discusses the Brooklyn Nets issuing Kyrie Irving a 5 game suspension without pay on his failure to issue no clear apology for promoting a book and film containing anti-Semitic rhetoric on his social media. Did the Brooklyn Nets give the proper response to the situation at hand? Can he continue to be the face of an organization without any backlash? Fly Eagles Fly! Marcus Spears and Ryan Clark take a deeper look into the Eagles and try to figure out are they a true threat? Tune in to hear more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
